content.text:
[@Verinaut-01](@nj2Jn+MbEwGxJXYKlr6ZsQs4TuAaXdUXScIziecH0Rc=.ed25519) 

> So. The “state violence” in this case is utilizing the legal system to extract punitive damages from a corporation that ignored the terms of a license?

I don't feel bad about it, but I don't really want to have to add the legal system as a dependency. I'm fine using the legal system as a last resort, but I'd like to try other reasonable solutions before appealing to the state to solve our problems.
